languages.text: "Когда братья и сестры отправляются по другую сторону, нас переполняет радость. Ибо души их прежде остальных попадают в ласковые длани Неумирающего и могут служить Ему так, как не можем мы".
"It brings me comfort when my brothers and sisters cross to the other side. The Undying One has called them to His side so they can serve Him in ways we cannot."
languages.original_text: "Когда братья и сестры отправляются по другую сторону, нас переполняет радость. Ибо души их прежде остальных попадают в ласковые длани Неумирающего и могут служить Ему так, как не можем мы".

traits.locale_text: "It brings me comfort when my brothers and sisters cross to the other side. The Undying One has called them to His side so they can serve Him in ways we cannot."

"Whenever my brothers and sisters cross over to the other side, we feel at ease. For it means that the Undying One has accepted their souls earlier than the rest so that they can serve Him in ways we cannot."
"It brings me comfort when my brothers and sisters cross to the other side. The Undying One has called them to His side so they can serve Him in ways we cannot."
"It brings me comfort when my brothers and sisters cross to the other side. The Undying One has called them to His side so they can serve Him in ways we cannot."
"It brings me comfort when my brothers and sisters cross to the other side. The Undying One has called them to His side so they can serve Him in ways we cannot."
"It brings me comfort when my brothers and sisters cross to the other side. The Undying One has called them to His side so they can serve Him in ways we cannot."
"It brings me comfort when my brothers and sisters cross to the other side. The Undying One has called them to His side so they can serve Him in ways we cannot."

languages.text: «Me reconforta que mis hermanos y hermanas crucen al otro lado. El Inmortal los ha llamado a su vera para servirle de maneras que a nosotros nos resulta imposible».
languages.original_text: "It brings me comfort when my brothers and sisters cross to the other side. The Undying One has called them to His side so they can serve Him in ways we cannot."

traits.locale_text: «Me reconforta que mis hermanos y hermanas crucen al otro lado. El Inmortal los ha llamado a su vera para servirle de maneras que a nosotros nos resulta imposible».

languages.text: 「兄弟姉妹があちら側へ渡る時、私は安らぎを得られたの。不死の者が彼らをおそばに召され、私たちにはできない形で主に仕えることになるのだから」
languages.original_text: "It brings me comfort when my brothers and sisters cross to the other side. The Undying One has called them to His side so they can serve Him in ways we cannot."

traits.locale_text: 「兄弟姉妹があちら側へ渡る時、私は安らぎを得られたの。不死の者が彼らをおそばに召され、私たちにはできない形で主に仕えることになるのだから」

languages.text: “当我的兄弟姐妹抵达彼岸时，我会感到欣慰。他们得到了不死之神的呼唤，这样一来，他们便能以我们无法实现的方式来服侍祂。”
languages.original_text: "It brings me comfort when my brothers and sisters cross to the other side. The Undying One has called them to His side so they can serve Him in ways we cannot."

traits.locale_text: “当我的兄弟姐妹抵达彼岸时，我会感到欣慰。他们得到了不死之神的呼唤，这样一来，他们便能以我们无法实现的方式来服侍祂。”

languages.text: "Es gibt mir Trost, wenn meine Brüder und Schwestern auf die andere Seite wechseln. Der Todlose hat sie an Seine Seite gerufen, damit sie Ihm so dienen können, wie es uns verwehrt ist."
languages.original_text: "It brings me comfort when my brothers and sisters cross to the other side. The Undying One has called them to His side so they can serve Him in ways we cannot."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt mir Trost, wenn meine Brüder und Schwestern auf die andere Seite wechseln. Der Todlose hat sie an Seine Seite gerufen, damit sie Ihm so dienen können, wie es uns verwehrt ist."

languages.text: « C'est un grand réconfort que de voir mes frères et sœurs passer de l'autre côté. L'Immortel les rappelle à ses côtés pour qu'ils Le servent comme seuls peuvent le faire les défunts. »
languages.original_text: "It brings me comfort when my brothers and sisters cross to the other side. The Undying One has called them to His side so they can serve Him in ways we cannot."

traits.locale_text: « C'est un grand réconfort que de voir mes frères et sœurs passer de l'autre côté. L'Immortel les rappelle à ses côtés pour qu'ils Le servent comme seuls peuvent le faire les défunts. »

languages.original_text: "It brings me comfort when my brothers and sisters cross to the other side. The Undying One has called them to His side so they can serve Him in ways we cannot."

languages.text: "Tarikattaki kardeşlerimin öteki tarafa geçmesi, içimi rahatlatıyor. Ölmeyen, bizim sunamadığımız hizmetleri O'na sunabilmeleri için onları yanına çağırır."
languages.original_text: "It brings me comfort when my brothers and sisters cross to the other side. The Undying One has called them to His side so they can serve Him in ways we cannot."
